localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Shopping online can be hard and expensive. Closet AI lets you upload a photo of a clothing item from the internet or your own closet and quickly uses AI to build an outfit that matches your item based on 100,000+ items, 100+ brands and your price range! 🚀
blogPost.body: Shopping online can be hard and expensive. Closet AI lets you upload a photo of a clothing item from the internet or your own closet and quickly uses AI to build an outfit that matches your item based on 100,000+ items, 100+ brands and your price range! 🚀
blogPost.title: Closet AI - Build your next outfit with AI
blogPost.author: Dylan Skelly

localize.description: 网上购物又难又贵。衣柜AI让你从网上或自己的衣柜里上传一张衣服的照片，根据10万+商品、100+品牌和你的价格区间，快速用AI打造一套与你的商品相匹配的衣服! 🚀
localize.tagline: 用AI打造你的下一件衣服

localize.description: 網上購物又難又貴。衣櫃AI讓你從網上或自己的衣櫃裏上傳一張衣服的照片，根據10萬+商品、100+品牌和你的價格區間，快速用AI打造一套與你的商品相匹配的衣服! 🚀
localize.tagline: 用AI打造你的下一件衣服

previous.excerpt: Stike allows you to use your Debit Card, Credit Card or Bank account to instantly send and receive funds with 0 fees using the Bitcoin Lightning network to transmit payments. Users can also send to regular Bitcoin addresses as well.
previous.title: Strike - Send money instantly, with no fees, anywhere in the world

localize.description: Stike允许您使用您的借记卡、信用卡或银行账户以0费用使用比特币闪电网络即时发送和接收资金，传输支付。用户也可以向普通的比特币地址发送。
localize.tagline: 在世界任何地方即时汇款，不收取任何费用。

localize.description: Stike允許您使用您的借記卡、信用卡或銀行賬戶以0費用使用比特幣閃電網絡即時發送和接收資金，傳輸支付。用戶也可以向普通的比特幣地址發送。
localize.tagline: 在世界任何地方即時匯款，不收取任何費用。

next.excerpt: Paid Rooms lets you host paywalled private clubhouse rooms. Set one up in less than 30 seconds, simply: 1) Sign up with your phone number 2) Enter your room details 3) Share it an get paid 💰
next.title: Paid Clubhouse Rooms - Charge $$$ for Clubhouse rooms

localize.description: 付费房可以让您托管付费墙式私人会所房间。在不到30秒的时间里就可以设置一个，简单地说：1）用你的电话号码注册 2）输入你的房间细节 3）分享它并获得报酬 💰
付費房可以讓您託管付費牆式私人會所房間。在不到30秒的時間裏就可以設置一個，簡單地說：1）用你的電話號碼註冊 2）輸入你的房間細節 3）分享它並獲得報酬 💰
